import React from'react';import API from'../utils/API';import{Card,CardText,CardBody,CardTitle,CardSubtitle}from'reactstrap';function CardWeatherDetail(props){// When the 'Save this Weather Point' button is clicked

API.saveWeather({id:props.id,country:props.country,city:props.name,latitude:props.latitude,longitude:props.longitude,temp:props.temp,feelsLike:props.feelsLike,dateAdded:Date.now()});alert("Saved ".concat(props.name,"!"));}return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement(Card,null,React.createElement(CardBody,null,React.createElement(CardTitle,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Weather Detail")),React.createElement(CardSubtitle,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Country:")," ",props.country),React.createElement(CardSubtitle,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"City:")," ",props.name),React.createElement(CardText,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Temp:")," ",((props.temp-273.15)*1.8+32).toFixed(2),"\xB0"),React.createElement(CardText,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Feels Like:")," ",((props.feelsLike-273.15)*1.8+32).toFixed(2),"\xB0"),React.createElement(CardText,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Latitude:")," ",props.latitude),React.createElement(CardText,null,React.createElement("strong",null,"Longitude:")," ",props.longitude))),React.createElement("button",{className:"btn btn-primary btn-width",onClick:handleSaveWeather},"Save this Weather Point"));};export default CardWeatherDetail;
